name: simple_direct_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.5 grobbles
convert 4 flurbs to grobbles

name: reverse_lookup
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobbles
convert 10 grobbles to flurbs

name: two_hop_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.0 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 2.0 zepts
convert 5 flurbs to zepts

name: three_hop_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.5 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 4.0 zepts
define 1 zept = 0.5 quibs
convert 8 flurbs to quibs

name: addition_same_unit
code:
define 1 flurb = 1.0 grobbles
compute 10 flurbs + 5 flurbs in flurbs

name: addition_mixed_units
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.0 grobbles
compute 2 flurbs + 6 grobbles in grobbles

name: subtraction_mixed
code:
define 1 flurb = 5.0 zepts
compute 10 flurbs - 20 zepts in zepts

name: multiplication_units
code:
define 1 voom = 2.0 quibs
compute 4 vooms * 3 vooms in vooms

name: division_units
code:
define 1 flurb = 4.0 grobbles
compute 20 flurbs / 5 flurbs in flurbs

name: complex_expression
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 3.0 zepts
compute 10 flurbs + 5 grobbles - 10 zepts in zepts

name: fractional_conversion
code:
define 1 voom = 1.5 quibs
convert 6 vooms to quibs

name: reverse_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 5.0 zepts
convert 50 zepts to flurbs

name: diamond_graph
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobbles
define 1 flurb = 4.0 zepts
define 1 grobble = 2.0 zepts
convert 3 flurbs to zepts

name: mixed_addition_three_units
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.0 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 2.0 zepts
compute 2 flurbs + 3 grobbles + 12 zepts in zepts

name: zero_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 7.0 quibs
convert 0 flurbs to quibs

name: large_scale_conversion
goal: Test numeric precision with large values
code:
define 1 flurb = 1.5 grobbles
convert 10000 flurbs to grobbles

name: tiny_fraction_conversion
code:
define 1 voom = 0.001 quibs
convert 5 vooms to quibs

name: four_hop_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 3.0 zepts
define 1 zept = 1.5 quibs
define 1 quib = 2.0 vooms
convert 4 flurbs to vooms

name: bidirectional_verification
description: Convert forward and backward to verify consistency
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.0 grobbles
convert 12 grobbles to flurbs

name: multiplication_chain
code:
define 1 flurb = 4.0 zepts
compute 5 flurbs * 3 flurbs in zepts

name: division_with_remainder
code:
define 1 voom = 3.0 quibs
compute 10 vooms / 3 vooms in vooms

name: nested_operations
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 5.0 zepts
compute (10 flurbs + 20 grobbles) * 2 grobbles in zepts

name: identity_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 1.0 grobbles
convert 42 flurbs to flurbs

name: circular_graph
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 3.0 zepts
define 1 zept = 0.1666... flurbs
convert 6 flurbs to zepts

name: mixed_arithmetic_four_units
code:
define 1 flurb = 2.0 grobbles
define 1 grobble = 3.0 zepts
define 1 zept = 4.0 quibs
compute 1 flurb + 2 grobbles + 3 zepts + 4 quibs in quibs

name: subtraction_negative_result
code:
define 1 flurb = 5.0 zepts
compute 10 zepts - 4 flurbs in zepts

name: unit_power_conversion
code:
define 1 meter_squared = 10.76 feet_squared
convert 5 meter_squared to feet_squared

name: temperature_offset_conversion
description: Convert with offset (like Celsius to Fahrenheit)
code:
define celsius_to_fahrenheit(c) = c * 1.8 + 32
convert 100 celsius to fahrenheit

name: percentage_calculation
code:
define 1 percent = 0.01 decimal
convert 75 percent to decimal

name: scientific_notation
code:
define 1 kilometer = 1000.0 meters
convert 1e6 meters to kilometers
